title: Two Strangers Trapped in a Home - Trailer for 'Persona' Horror Thriller
description: "Did we do something to deserve it?" "No one deserves this..." Gravitas Ventures has unveiled the official trailer for Persona, an indie horror thriller from director Mike Ho, mostly known for making many music videos over the last decade. Set for a VOD release in December if anyone wants to watch. Not sure why they needed to use the same Persona title as the iconic 1966 Ingmar Bergman film. A woman wakes up locked in a house, injured with no memory. She's terrified yet relieved to find a woman bound in another room. These two strangers must work together to figure out what's really going on before the door is unlocked. Who is coming back for her? Why are they locked up in this house? Starring Shanti Lowry and Sophia Ali, with Andrew Howard and Omar Gooding. This doesn't look so interesting - better to just rewatch Saw again. Here's the official trailer (+ scary poster) for Mike Ho's hororr film Persona, direct from YouTube: Two women wake up injured, with seemingly no memory of how they got there, trapped inside a secluded home. These two strangers must work together to figure out just what’s going on - before the […]
author: Alex Billington

text: TRAILERS by November 6, 2024Source: YouTube "Did we do something to deserve it?" "No one deserves this..." Gravitas Ventures has unveiled the official trailer for Persona, an indie horror thriller from director Mike Ho, mostly known for making many music videos over the last decade. Set for a VOD release in December if anyone wants to watch. Not sure why they needed to use the same Persona title as the iconic 1966 Ingmar Bergman film. A woman wakes up locked in a house, injured with no memory. She's terrified yet relieved to find a woman bound in another room. These two strangers must work together to figure out what's really going on before the door is unlocked. Who is coming back for her? Why are they locked up in this house? Starring Shanti Lowry and Sophia Ali, with Andrew Howard and Omar Gooding. This doesn't look so interesting - better to just rewatch Saw again. Here's the official trailer (+ scary poster) for Mike Ho's hororr film Persona, direct from YouTube: Two women wake up injured, with seemingly no memory of how they got there, trapped inside a secluded home. These two strangers must work together to figure out just what’s going on - before the doors are unlocked and their captor is revealed. Can she figure out who is coming back for them... before his arrival? Persona is directed by American filmmaker Mike Ho, director of the action thriller film Imani previously, plus tons of other music videos as well. The screenplay is written by Blyth Kemp. Produced by Shanti Lowry. This hasn't premiered at any film festivals or elsewhere, as far we know. Gravitas Ventures debut Mike Ho's Persona horror film direct-to-VOD in the US starting December 3rd, 2024 coming soon. Anyone into it? Find more posts: To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
November 6, 2024
Source: YouTube

"Did we do something to deserve it?" "No one deserves this..." Gravitas Ventures has unveiled the official trailer for Persona, an indie horror thriller from director Mike Ho, mostly known for making many music videos over the last decade. Set for a VOD release in December if anyone wants to watch. Not sure why they needed to use the same Persona title as the iconic 1966 Ingmar Bergman film. A woman wakes up locked in a house, injured with no memory. She's terrified yet relieved to find a woman bound in another room. These two strangers must work together to figure out what's really going on before the door is unlocked. Who is coming back for her? Why are they locked up in this house? Starring Shanti Lowry and Sophia Ali, with Andrew Howard and Omar Gooding. This doesn't look so interesting - better to just rewatch Saw again.

Here's the official trailer (+ scary poster) for Mike Ho's hororr film Persona, direct from YouTube:

Two women wake up injured, with seemingly no memory of how they got there, trapped inside a secluded home. These two strangers must work together to figure out just what’s going on - before the doors are unlocked and their captor is revealed. Can she figure out who is coming back for them... before his arrival? Persona is directed by American filmmaker Mike Ho, director of the action thriller film Imani previously, plus tons of other music videos as well. The screenplay is written by Blyth Kemp. Produced by Shanti Lowry. This hasn't premiered at any film festivals or elsewhere, as far we know. Gravitas Ventures debut Mike Ho's Persona horror film direct-to-VOD in the US starting December 3rd, 2024 coming soon. Anyone into it?

Find more posts: To Watch, Trailer
